GenAiFunction.description:
Run a single SOQL Query and return a list of records or errors.
ALWAYS: - Use Explore_Org_Data_Model first when querying Custom Objects - Verify field names and relationships before constructing queries - Respect the 2000 record query limit - Include error handling in your implementation
NEVER: - Use Explore for Standard Objects (Account, Contact, User, etc.) - Query Custom Objects without checking their existence first - Exceed relationship query depth of 5 - Ignore field-level security
GenAiFunction.progressIndicatorMessage: Run a single SOQL Query and return a list of records or errors
